name: Quill This Love
description:
“Every hedgehog must make a choice.”

  
Quill This Love is a story-driven interactive fiction in which you play as Achilles, a wandering hedgehog in search of shelter during a blizzard that must choose between traveling in the comfort of his own company or seeking solace in the uncertainties of intimacy. 

Whether you decide to stay outside or to venture into the castle, Achilles' life will never be the same.

✦ LGBT-centered narrative! ✦ Cute Papercraft Aesthetic! ✦ Multiple endings to reach!
